text:
Hello Everyone

I am new to HubSpot and want to create a website on HubSpot CMS for one of my client. I want to use a blank theme with only the necessary files. Please suggest to me the best approach.

Hi <@U070KQ765CK>

Creating theme using boilerplate will create all necessary files for you.
Should we use the boilerplate theme directly for development that HubSpot offers or should we create a child theme from boilerplate and start working on that?
If you are starting from scratch than you can start boilerplate theme directly.
Reminder: You can create a theme starting from the boilerplate a few different ways. Learn how <https://youtu.be/gBMaBD4G0fM>
